entry.title: Zelensky and Biden Discuss Ukraine's Grid as Country Scrambles to Restore Power
entry.content: Ukraine rushed to restore power supplies following the latest round of Russian attacks, while President Volodymyr Zelensky spoke with President Biden after a flurry of weekend diplomacy aimed at strengthening sanctions on Russia.

entry.title: U.S. Builds New Firewall to Stop Spread of Militant Islamists
entry.content: Hundreds of American troops join Western allies in Niger to block al Qaeda and Islamic State from advancing violence and influence in West Africa. “I don’t know that I’d call them winning. I‘d certainly say they’re holding.”
